mapper.select: SELECT B.*, M.Mem_ID, M.Mem_Name, R.Rom_MaxNo, R.Rom_Name, R.Rom_Price1, R.Rom_Price2, R.Rom_Price3, R.Rom_Price4 from Reservations B, members M, Rooms R WHERE B.Mem_Idx = M.Mem_Idx AND B.Rom_Idx = R.Rom_Idx AND B.Mem_Idx = #{roomNo} AND date(B.Rsv_InDate) >= date(now())
select COUNT(Rsv_Idx) AS count FROM Reservations
mapper.insert: insert into Reservations (Mem_Idx, Rom_Idx, Rsv_Num, Rsv_InDate, Rsv_OutDate, Rsv_DefPrice) values (#{memberNo}, #{roomNo}, #{headcount}, #{checkin}, #{checkout}, #{basicPrice})
mapper.delete: delete from Reservations where Rsv_Idx=#{no} AND Mem_Idx=#{memberNo} AND Rom_Idx=#{roomNo}
mapper.select: SELECT date(Rsv_InDate), date(Rsv_OutDate) from Reservations where date(Rsv_InDate) >= date(now()) and Rsv_YN = 'Y' and Rom_Idx = #{roomNo} order by Rom_Idx, RSV_InDate asc
